key_risks: Financial instability and high debt levels post-bankruptcy
Decline of traditional retail and reliance on struggling anchor tenants
High vacancy rates in enclosed malls
controversies: Dependence on tenants facing financial challenges
Ongoing concerns about long-term financial health
social_issues: Impact of retail decline on local economies
governance_issues: Execution of portfolio optimization and redevelopment strategies

sources.title: US Bankruptcy Court Approves CBL Properties' Plan of Reorganization
sources.snippet: On Nov. 1, 2020, CBL filed petitions in for voluntary relief under Chapter 11 of Title 11 of the United States Bankruptcy Code. CBL received support for the plan, with more than 95% of votes cast for all classes in favor of the plan's confirmation. The effective date of the plan is expected to be Nov. 1.

sources.title: CBL & Associates Properties, Inc. Emerged from Bankruptcy
sources.snippet: CBL & Associates Properties, Inc., emerged from its Chapter 11 bankruptcy as its plan of reorganization became effective on November 1, 2021. CBL & Associates Properties, Inc. had filed its third amended joint plan of reorganization with related disclosure statement in the US Bankruptcy Court on May 25, 2021.

sources.title: CBL, Lenders Agree on New Bankruptcy Plan to Cut $1 Billion Debt
sources.snippet: CBL & Associates Properties Inc. filed an amended Chapter 11 plan that incorporates a settlement with its key lenders, moving the mall operator a step closer to court approval of its reorganization. The amended plan would reduce CBL's funded debt by about $1 billion and cut annual interest payments by $20 million, CBL said in its amended ...

sources.title: CBL Properties files Chapter 11 bankruptcy - S&P Global
sources.snippet: CBL & Associates Properties Inc. filed a voluntary Chapter 11 petition in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the District of Delaware to recapitalize the company by implementing a plan that includes restructuring portions of its debt. The company plans to use the Chapter 11 process to implement the terms that were outlined in a restructuring support agreement it reached in August.

sources.title: CBL & Associates reveals key bankruptcy deal with lenders
